name: non_transac
description: This is a common package.json file for all non_transac themes.

scripts.patternlab: rm -rf patternlab && composer create-project -n pattern-lab/edition-drupal-standard patternlab && php patternlab/core/console -c --set twigAutoescape=0 && php patternlab/core/console -c --set sourceDir=../components && rm -rf patternlab/source
